mapper.select: select o.id ,r.room_no, r.status, t.room_type ,o.order_time,o.time,o.check_in_time,o.check_out_time from room as r inner join room_type as t inner join `order` as o inner join `user` as u where r.room_type_id=t.id and o.room_id=r.id and o.user_id = u.id and u.id = #{0}

select o.id ,r.room_no, r.status, t.room_type ,o.order_time,o.time,o.check_in_time,o.check_out_time from room as r inner join room_type as t inner join `order` as o where r.room_type_id=t.id and o.room_id=r.id
select count(*) from `order` as o inner join user as u where o.user_id=u.id and u.id=#{0}
select t.price from `order` as o inner join room as r inner join room_type as t where o.room_id=r.id and r.room_type_id=t.id and o.id=#{0}
select COUNT(*) from `order` where room_id=#{0} and time=STR_TO_DATE(#{1},'%Y-%m-%d') and status!='已退房'
mapper.insert: insert into `order` (user_id, status, order_time, `time`, room_id) values (#{userId},'待入住',now(),date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d'),#{roomId})
